title: Work required to move charges from infinity

content.question: It takes 5.00 x 10-14 J of work to bring a particle with charge +Q from infinity to a distance of 10.0 cm from positive point charge Y. How much work would be required to bring the particle from infinity to a distance 5.0 cm from Y if the charge on the particle were +Q/2 instead?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
